attributes.action: install a 3 way crossing at ship lane and replace the mini round about
attributes.additional_details:
Due to safety concerns for all pedestrians including the elderly, disabled and the local primary school children which use the pavements and the current Zebra Crossing in this area.

The cost implications to tax payers would be reduced with regards to repeated replacement of damaged safety barriers if the above improvements were implemented.
attributes.background: over a long time hgv usage and traffic has increased on the mini roundabout leading to many collisions and accidents putting a risk to all who live nearby and use the crossings and causing taxpayers to have to pay for damage to bollards and such

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
